title: Rangers, SIU apprehend Lyari gang notorious member
description: Rangers Sindh, in a joint operation with the Special Investigation Unit (SIU), arrested Anas Aftab Baloch, a notorious member of a Lyari gang involved in extortion. The arrest took place in Mureed Goth, Liaqatabad area. As per Rangers spokesperson on Tuesday, Anas, along with his associate Hassan, made extortion demands of 0.1 million rupees […]

title: Ashfaq Tola elected as Vice President SAFA
description: Ashfaq Yusuf Tola has been elected as the Vice President of the South Asian Federation of Accountants (SAFA) in its annual elections, which include member countries such as Pakistan, Bangladesh, India, Sri Lanka, Nepal, Maldives, and Afghanistan. Previously, Ashfaq Yusuf Tola served as the Minister of State on Revenue and Chairman of the Tax […]

title: Body recovered from train at Karachi Cantt
description: The body of an unidentified individual has been recovered from the stationary train compartment of Karachi Cantt Station on Tuesday. Rescue sources informed that the body has been shifted to the hospital, meanwhile, efforts are underway to identify the deceased individual. In another incident, Karachi police arrested two individuals including a policeman for allegedly being […]

title: 94% Karachi buildings lack firefighting equipment
description: An audit after a detailed inspection by Karachi Fire Brigade Department (KFBD) of three important highways including 266 buildings of I.I. Chandrigar Road, Shahrah Faisal and Shahrah Quaideen revealed that 94 percent of the buildings violate the fire safety laws. According to the report, fire extinguishers were installed in only six buildings out of […]

title: Integrated efforts needed ensure child protection: First Lady
description: The First Lady Samina Arif Alvi on Tuesday, stressed the need for effective implementation of Zainab Alert Act, an integrated single helpline, and close coordination among all the relevant organizations and stakeholders for speedy recovery of missing children. The first lady, while chairing a meeting during visit of Roshni Helpline- a nongovernmental organization working […]

title: Interior Minister, IGP brief media about law and order measures
description: Caretaker Minister for Information, Minority Affairs, and Social Protection, President Arts Council of Pakistan Karachi Muhammad Ahmad Shah, Inspector General Police Sindh Riffat Mukhtar and Additional IG Karachi Khadim Hussain Rind, jointly conducted a press conference here on Tuesday. While addressing the media, Minister Muhammad Ahmad Shah emphasized a policy of zero tolerance against […]

title: CAA takes major step to enhance security at  airports
description: The Civil Aviation Authority (CAA) has taken major steps to enhance security measures at the major airports and decided to install 28 modern baggage scanning machines, ARY News reported on Tuesday, citing sources. Sources told media that CAA is importing state-of-the-art baggage scanning machines at major airports in Pakistan. The latest machines will be […]

title: JI berates PPP, interim setup over rising crime
description: Jamaat-e-Islami (JI) Karachi Ameer Engr Hafiz Naeemur Rehman has said that there is no big difference between the previous Pakistan People Party government and the prevailing caretaker regime when it comes to the always rising crime statistics. The JI leader said that 135 citizens lost their lives whereas another 1,150 received bullet injuries while […]

title: Unveiling the erosion of reading habits
description: BELONGING to the generation X (Born Between 1965-1980), I have journeyed through time with a sharp twist and ever-evolving landscape in technology and gadgets. From bulky fewer-channelled TVs to slim HD ones, from heavy telephones with cords to wireless smart phones, from film-developed cameras to digital cameras, from in-person gossips to social media apps, from […]

title: Regional dynamics and Pak-Afghan relations
description: THE relationship between Pakistan and Afghanistan is marked by historical, cultural and geopolitical complexities. The two neighbouring countries share a porous border, a common Pashtun ethnicity and a history intertwined with various civilizations and empires. The historical roots of Pakistan-Afghanistan relations run deep into the pre-independence period when the territories that now constitute these two […]

title: Respect code of conduct
description: ELECTION Commission of Pakistan (ECP) has urged electronic media outlets to refrain from broadcasting poll surveys, citing their potential to influence voters’ free choices. The ECP’s directive, outlined in a letter to the Pakistan Electronic Media Regulatory Authority (PEMRA), underscores the importance of media adherence to the Code of Conduct for national media, particularly […]

title: Strange logic of JUI chief
description: AS the country is moving swiftly towards the general election, it is perplexing that Maulana Fazlur Rehman, a seasoned politician and chief of his own faction of JUI is, once again, trying to throw spanners in the works. In the backdrop of an attack on his convoy at Yarik interchange in DI Khan, Fazal […]

title: Propaganda against armed forces
description: IN the backdrop of a sustained campaign being launched by some vested interests, the Senate passed a unanimous resolution, moved by PPP lawmaker Behramand Tangi from Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, seeking severe punishment for those who are indulging in propaganda against the armed forces. The resolution called for a ten-year disqualification from public office for those […]
